body1: Hello, my name is Manuel and I like to develop software.
body2: I enjoy art, design and creativity. I love music and I like to play music from time to time.
body3: I also like playing videogames. Specially rhythm games.
body4: I like to swim and sometimes I watch movies.
body6: I like to learn, I am committed, determined, autonomous and recursive.
body7: I want to accomplish personal and proffesional goals looking after new experiences.
